title: Is This Pete Buttigieg’s Defense of Late-Term Abortions?
subtitle: "These hypotheticals are usually set up in order to provoke a strong emotional [response]," the former South Bend, Indiana, mayor declared.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A transcript reproduces Pete Buttigieg's response when he was asked whether there should be any temporal limit on a woman's right to have an abortion.
